titleStmt.title: Act for publishing his Majesties most gracious letter
Proclamations. 1700-07-26
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at our court at Loo, the 26th day of July 1700. And of our reign the 12th year.
With drop-head title on p.[2]: His Majesties most gracious letter: directed to his grace James Duke of Queensberry, his Majesties high commissioner, and the privy council of Scotland.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
